name: Bel & Poppy - AGBIC Edition
description:
A game about a little ninja named Bel and her sleepy pistol, Poppy. 

Created for AGBICjam 2018, based on a fictional Famicase design by Kristian Spears:

Run, jump and shoot your way through a bunch of tricky levels!

Use Poppy to activate switches and disable enemies. He's pretty lazy though, so you'll probably have to wake him up first. 

 

Now, I know you're thinking: 

"This is just mindless, gratuitous violence. Where's the download button?!" 

It's right down there ↓  but there's also a cool story!

Credits
  • Created & developed by Ramifactor
  • Famicase design and original concept by Kristian Spears
  • Music:
    • Azureflux - Superbyte
    • Ramifactor - Let's Go Poppy!
    • RoccoW - Bleeps Galore
    • Scott Buckley - Life Is

Finally, a huge thanks to anyone who has provided feedback during development (on itch, Discord, Twitter or Mastodon), and an even bigger thanks if you actually take the time to try out the game. Feedback is always appreciated!
